website_summaries.verdict: With whole-grain wheat, sun-ripened fruit, and a range of delectable flavors like apple cinnamon, lemon, and blueberry, you can’t find a better vegan fig bar.
pros: Available in eight flavors, a variety pack, and multiple sizes
Great for snacking on the go
cons: Some flavors are pricier than others

customer_reviews.title: Gaggingly sweet!
customer_reviews.text: I know Americans are addicted to sugar, but this is ridiculous. I ate one bar and tossed the rest. Twenty percent of the calories are from sugar (no more than 10% is the recommended figure for an overall diet). These bars are definitely not a healthful snack with 2 1/2 teaspoons of sugar per bar.
customer_reviews.author: Veritas

customer_reviews.title: Great...until you get a moldy bar...
customer_reviews.text: We've been enjoying these fig bars for quite some time. Then, we got a moldy bar and were quite horrified. Before I threw away the rest of the box, I opened other packages and found four more bars with mold. I won't be buying these again. Tasted good, but aren't worth the risk of feeding my family mold...
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: BAD Recipe Changes!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just reordered these: WOW!!! There are BIG (and unannounced) quality-decreasing changes in the recipe: more sodium (10 milligrams more), more calories (20 more), less protien (half as much), more carbs, and a higher breading to fruit filling ratio. Qualitatively they don't taste as good, probably because there's more breading. We Have been eating these for a long time but will not reorder.
customer_reviews.author: bardo

customer_reviews.title: Product is a health hazard. Full of mold :(
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how was it stored. but it had mold all over it. Please make sure it's okay before you take a bite.
customer_reviews.author: A.L

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t purchase this product from seller again
customer_reviews.text: The product had already been opened AND TAPED BACK TOGETHER. ALSO it smelled so strongly of cigarette smoke. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Typically these are great but we got a molded batch.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these bars. I found these on a steal of a deal only the blueberry flavor. My thought is score!! These can be pricey but for better quality ingredients I can’t complain. My husband asked me one night if I’ve been checking his bars after I take them out of their packaging, I told him no. He said there’s mold on that package. Okay maybe it’s a fluke. Open another one, more mold. The expiration was sometime for the end of September. I was disappointed that they didn’t even last until their expiration. No we double check when we pack them in his lunch. Please pay extra attention to the date!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabby G.

customer_reviews.title: Big thanks to all those that make things happen
customer_reviews.text: They are delicious and somewhat healthier than other snacks. I recieved this at my house at 8:00 am just in 2 days after placing the order. (Prime) I just want to thank all those people that work at the warehouses from janitors to supervisors, thanks for your hard work. You guys are the ones that keep the nation moving forward so other can have the luxury of staying at home and get stuff delivered to them. BIG THANKS
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are similar to fig bars that you buy in the store but are larger and not as sweet. There's 2 bars per packet. I love them! I love the whole wheat outside crust and the inside fruit! Honestly, I eat them for breakfast lots of the time. My favorite are the chocolate bars! If you want moist, delicious, and chocolate, then these bars in chocolate are tremendous! I still love both the raspberry and blueberry fruit flavored bars and have eaten them the most. My recommendation would be for you to give these bars a try. They make a great snack.
customer_reviews.author: tndee

customer_reviews.title: Nice but TOO SWEET.
customer_reviews.text: PROS: I like that it's vegan. I like that the outside is made of whole wheat instead of cheap refined white flour. I like that they are reasonably substantial. CON: Too sweet. The filling is made of dates which are pretty sweet themselves. Did they really have to add sugar - which is the second ingredient by the way. In fact dried cane sugar is the second ingredient and fig paste is actually third. Then, there are additional sweeteners as sub-ingredients afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Analytical Thinker

customer_reviews.title: Cruddy condition of boxes and contents
customer_reviews.text: The cookie bars are simple but great, whether apple, blueberry, or raspberry. My grandsons from 3-12yo love them, and adults can appreciate the 200 calories per pkg vs the calories if other sweets. However, receiving torn open boxes with crushed cookies, because subscription items of varying weights get chunked together in the box is NOT cool. From now on I'll order 24 raspberry & blueberry together via another online retailer, as their Nature's Bakery boxes are real cardboard, built for shipping - and the price is better, too.
customer_reviews.author: G'ma Erika

customer_reviews.title: Fig Newton's Grown-Up Brother
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot like Fig/Apple Newtons or NutriGrain bars, but less sweet, and more substantial. You get 12 twin-packs of these little square bars (each bar is about 2" square.) They're vegan, non-GMO, whole wheat, with no weird stuff in them. The apple cinnamon flavor in these isn't super pronounced - which is good, in my opinion - I only bought the apple cinnamon because it was cheaper than the other flavors at the time. I've purchased these before, and will definitely do so again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Southworth

customer_reviews.title: This product is a REAL smash.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a box of these soft, chewy, flavorful snacks for $7 and change. I also ordered a microwave. Let that part sink in. I don’t need a refund. I would have liked to just send a message. Like: hey the microwave packaging was way too big and not enough packing in the box and the poor little fig bars didn’t stand a chance. There are 12 packets of fig bars. At least 4 of them looked pre-chewed. Still delicious. A few months back I had to return the item I had ordered because of poor packaging. The microwave packaging was good so I didn’t have to return anything.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: quite good
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant about these after reading a few reviews but we all have different thoughts. I found these to be exactly what I expected. Needed something to eat quickly in the morning to get something in my stomach asap. These were fine. While they have plenty of sugar, they don't have as much as some other popular brands. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Our Town Book Reviews

customer_reviews.title: This batch I got is off
customer_reviews.text: I eat these fig bars all the time. I have ordered them on amazon before. I don’t know what is wrong with this particular batch I got but it tastes as if it wasn’t cooked completely. You can see the visual difference it is a much lighter color and it kinda crumbles into pieces. It kinda sucks bc I bought like 5 boxes of this and I’m kinda stuck eating gross fig bars
customer_reviews.author: Elanor

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty, and vegan.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in a timeline and condition as expected. Very tasty, and vegan. I keep these at my desk at work to use as a snack ... and share with my vegan co-workers. [Updated 7 Apr 2019] I also get the variety pack to share at work. All flavors are very tasty. Also, these are great to dunk in coffee to moisten it. But just for a second, else it could fall apart in your coffee cup.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Lembcke

customer_reviews.title: Love these bars
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for twice the price at a local health and nutrition store .I was so happy to find these on Amazon as I eat one pack ( which has two cookies in it ) daily . The product came packaged nicely with good expiration date , can't ask for more than that .Blueberry is my favorite flavor , I believe these really taste good .Nutrition wise they are pretty good so indulge.
customer_reviews.author: susan johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent additions to ur snack or cookie bin.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great tasting snack bar. I like that they are packaged two in a pack. Taste and texture are excellent. We use them more as a cookie than a snack due to the sugar content. Figs are high in sugar but delicious and nutritious. They are also perfect for kids with braces. After they get their braces adjusted, they often have mouth pain eating hard foods so the hard granola or nut bars don’t work on those days. I can pack these in the lunch box and know it will get eaten.
customer_reviews.author: CityMominWoods

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fig bars with perfect portions
customer_reviews.text: I was offered this brand of fig bars as a complimentary snack during a flight. It was love at first bite! This brand tastes much more wholesome than the ever popular Newton figs. One actually feel good after eating this. It has got to be due to the wholesome ingredients they use here. They also package these bars in packets of two, which is the proper serving size! Anything more would be too much in one sitting. The price is also reasonable - a lot of the flavors are even cheaper than Newton figs (per ounce). I have only tried the original and raspberry flavors so far - can't wait to try the other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine C

customer_reviews.title: Too Much Sugar
customer_reviews.text: Not enough flavor and too much sugar. These are definitely snacks and not meal bars. They taste good when but not stellar, you can barely make out the raspberry flavoring. They're fresh but do not keep fresh in the box and wrapper for too long, this is good, it reminds you there aren't a bunch of chemicals and preservatives in them. Why three stars? The sugar! Too much of it! I recommend this product as a "once in a few" snack, nothing more. I find the same regarding the blueberry, Apricot, Fudge Brownie, etc.. As the vegan in the family I'm looking for something that has the same good texture when chewing, and non GMO and 1/2 the sugar content.
customer_reviews.author: Derek F

customer_reviews.title: What conditions were these stored in - TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: These are not at all like the ones found in the store. The cakey part was shiny and the taste is totally off. I opened 2 boxes (one for work and one for home) so I don't feel like I can send these back. I hate throwing food away. I am very angry.
customer_reviews.author: Luli

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, Wonderful Brownies!
customer_reviews.text: These Brownies are absolutely delicious! By purchasing them on prime instead of the local grocery store I am saving about $14. Surviving on a monthly disability pension this has helped me survive better. On top of the excellent care of packaging they arrive on my doorstep 2 days after placing every order! This delicious snack has also helped with my autoimmune digestive disorders. They contain fiber and flaxseed oil along with other very healthy ingredients which have promote regularity. Besides being healthy, they taste phenomenal. I highly recommend this product along with this vender. I am quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen J Abare

customer_reviews.title: ummmm....
customer_reviews.text: Discovered this brand recently and was digging their blueberry bars so I thought I would try the straight up fig. Ummm, not so good some how. There was off taste to the bar, old, stale, you take your pick. Although it was within its expiration time by six months. I just bought a box of the peach one for the first time, let me go see how those are. Sadly, no return on bum food products, even if they're funky. Maybe I'll just stick with blueberry.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Just right!....Lemon Fig Bars
customer_reviews.text: Not too grainy.....not too lemony.....Not too sweet....Just taste GOOD. And, SO good for you. Natural ingredients that you can pronounce! I've eaten fig bars off the grocery store shelf (not the BIG name brand) that tasted SO grainy that you could barely swallow them.....& full of junk you can't even pronounce. These are SO superior in texture to all of those. They are fresh. There are 2 FAT bars in EACH package. Each bar is about the size of 2+ Fig Ne...tons.....maybe the size of 3 or 4 of them IF they've reduced the size of the bars (as everyone seems to be doing these days).
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous, nutrition info is for HALF a pack!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE nutrition information is for one little bar. I really felt like this company was working on receiving customers after I had been buying these in packs of 6, eating at least one a day as a sweet snack—thinking they were pretty healthy. But After months of eating them daily I realized the nutrition info was for 1/2 a pack, bringing the calorie total to 200 calories not 100 (with a lot more sugar and carbs). Also the last package of 6 I bought felt way more dry than the first. It was not past the exportation date. Not sure if it’s a new recipe (I don’t have the old box to compare) or freshness issue.
customer_reviews.author: MayaNYC

customer_reviews.title: Full of junk and tastes even worse.
customer_reviews.text: Not very good. These are very oily and hard. I feel like maybe the expiration date has been changed because they are like rocks. I’ve eaten a few, because I paid for them, but it’s getting harder and harder. I thought with all of the processed stuff and preservatives they would be okay but I just can’t go on anymore, I have to speak up.
customer_reviews.author: ChemNerd

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dry and tasted stale!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived dry and tasted stale! In fairness, the sell-by date was in the future, so I assume the dryness and stale taste was due to the way it was stored and not its age. We are familiar with this product and eat it bought locally, so we feel we are making a critical but fair comparison.
customer_reviews.author: SocraticMethod

customer_reviews.title: Great for long-distance cycling or a quick snack at home
customer_reviews.text: I discovered these when they were given away at a gran fondo (long-distance cycling event). Your body can tell when it's receiving something natural vs. artificial and these are definitely the former as opposed to some sports snacks. It's great high-quality carbs. Off the bike, I often enjoy one as a quick snack, swabbing a big hunk of all-natural peanut butter on each bite to create a quick mini peanut-butter & jelly sandwich. Combining that with a glass of nonfat milk I get a filling and healthful snack that's not too heavy on the carbs which is what I want when I'm off the bike.
customer_reviews.author: nicknamesalreadytaken

customer_reviews.title: Great snack for bike rides!
customer_reviews.text: These brownies are great. I take them on my bicycle rides. They're small enough that they can be carried in a small bike bag but they provide enough callories to keep me going. I think they taste great. Maybe not quite as good as a homemade gooey fudgy brownie or even a frosted Little Debbie brand, but I personally wouldn't want anything that sweet while biking or hiking.
customer_reviews.author: BenjaminTop Contributor: Mountain Biking

customer_reviews.title: Not a brownie ,VERY little chocolate Flavor . Tastes like an overprocessed factory soft sugar cookie
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a Brownie , and that's where it ends . Doesn't smell very chocolatey and doesn't taste Chocolatey . I feel ripped off a touch , but they do taste good . Filling and great for an on-the-go-snack ,, but beware that this product has that highly processed taste , not very home-like taste .. Some food scientist came up with a way to make it look good without having to add the proper amount of some chocolate .
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Did I order stale?
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite flavors of this brand. However, the box seemed to have been stored in a warehouse for too long. Several were hard and dried out--stale!!! The ones that were not hardened did not seem to have optimum flavor. If you luck out and get a fresh box, consider yourself blessed. You will enjoy. Ordering it online is a crapshoot!
customer_reviews.author: Najsma1

customer_reviews.title: Subtle lemon taste
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had all the flavors of these bars and I really like them. They’re slightly sweet so they make for a good somewhat healthy dessert. The lemon taste is very subtle- honestly I wouldn’t guess lemon so I’d say they’re the closest ones to original fig bars.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Dambrie

customer_reviews.title: My go-to snack and not as sweet as the popular Fig Newton brand
customer_reviews.text: It's really difficult for me to not eat a whole lot of these since they're so good and it's kind of a bad idea to 110 calories a bar and there are two in each pack. But they're a great afternoon snack or I'll even have it for a quick breakfast. It's mostly healthy I think but who cares...they're good. I've tried most of the flavors and all of them are pretty delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Right Hand of Doom

customer_reviews.title: These will make your mouth happy.
customer_reviews.text: Is "box to table," a thing? My blueberry arrived today, wow. Fresh is an understatement. *each package contains two, linked, large newtons. These are amazing and I just ordered more. Nice product folks!
customer_reviews.author: Frosty

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE these fig bars!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have recently been trying to eat a bit more "healthy" and discovered Fig Bars!!!! First I found them at Costco but then I tried Amazon! I really don't know about the other people who had problems but we have had none!!!! The freshness is great, flavor great, quality great!!!!! We are trying more flavors!!!! These bars have helped me curb my sugar addiction and so they have helped me keep my health! I would recommend everyone try them they are so good!!!! I am sure you will want to thank me once you try them!!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Best flavor of the Nature’s Bakery fig bars.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a long time fan of Nature’s Bakery bars. I like having healthier options to take to work and around the house as well and these are perfect for those same reasons. The only thing I dislike about this purchase is the price to quantity ratio. Other than that the buy is great! I’ve tried the regular fig, blueberry and raspberry flavored fig bars and so far these beat those three. The peach apricot taste isn’t as strong as I was expecting but I’m not seeing that as a negative. LOVE that each package is only 200 calories making each bar 100 individually.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Samaniego

customer_reviews.title: The Superior Fig Bar
customer_reviews.text: I used to eat fig newtons which is now just newtons, when I was pulled off of all chemical and preservatives in my diet especially High Fructose Corn Syrup. I really missed my fig bar them I found them first at Wal Mart bought it, tried it & fell in love with this fig bar. And it has just simple ingredients and you really taste the fig in the bar. So now I order them by the case thru Amazon (my Hero)
customer_reviews.author: ShadowofRavelyn

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Are these the best snack in the world? No. BUT they keep true tother flavor, are a hearty bar and taste great! I like how they are "healthier" as far as ingredients vs the bigger name-brand. I like these and they are a good snack. As always, be mindful of the portion sizes with these as one package contains two servings! (Still yummy)
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Tasty healthier snack bar (cookie? cake?). Mmm
customer_reviews.text: I love these fig bars (cookie? cake?). The peach/apricot is my favorite. They are a great tide you over snack or when you want a little something with your tea (or coffee). I usually eat one with my morning tea and the other with my 3p get me to the end of my day tea (they come 2/pack). These are a healthier flavorful good-tasting snack. In addition to the fruit, they contain fiber. Most of my friends eat these and they sell out quickly at my favourite cafe (which is why I purchase my own). Even little children love these. Thank you Amazon subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and son-in-law are vegans and they loved it. They were looking for something that tasted just like fig Newtons for a long time and this was just what they missed. I will be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Walker

customer_reviews.title: The fig bars are great.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the Whole Wheat Fig Bars but it took my husband a bit to like them. They are similar to the fig newtons you buy at the store but taste more wholesome, less processed. I have them on Subscribe and Save (they're that good), unfortunately this month they made a mistake and sent me the brownies.
customer_reviews.author: Christinna

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and Tasty Snack Bar
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice, subtle blueberry flavor. Two halves in each small bar. I appreciate the lack of additives etc. You probably need to like fig newtons to enjoy these. I have them in several flavors, probably like the Apple Cinnamon and Blueberry best....Raspberry comes in third. Highly recommend for a healthy snack.
customer_reviews.author: Art and Soul

customer_reviews.title: Date Bar by another name
customer_reviews.text: Nature's Bakery Vegan + non-GMO, Double Chocolate Brownie is a Date Bar, which tastes like a fig bar. But, there is an important difference: Fig bars have half of everything compared with these chocolate date bars. This is to say, a person can eat 1 date bar or 2 dig bars for the same calorie and nutrition count. And, fig bars cost much less. So, as far as snacks go, next time I plan to buy fig bars instead. The Nature's Bakery Vegan + non-GMO, Double Chocolate Brownies are tasty, but not tasty enough to justify the added cost on a snack that requires the consumer to each half as much.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy C Platt, MSM

customer_reviews.title: We hate that we like these so much but LOVE the no nuts/no dairy!
customer_reviews.text: I am always up for trying a snack that will has chocolate and is DAIRY FREE. These brownies fix that chocolate craving without being too sweet for 'the kids are finally in bed' treat. Plus they go great with coffee! Yes, the kids and spouse love them, too. Pricey but worth the occasional buy to keep around. (Serving size is one package = 2 bars)
customer_reviews.author: Jay Doll

customer_reviews.title: Very Delicious Fig Bar
customer_reviews.text: These Whole Wheat Fig Bars In Blueberry Are So Fresh Tasting & Are So Delicious & Nutritious. One Pack Contains 2 Squares, Perfect For A Quick Pick Up & Are Dairy Free, Nut Free, Vegan & Kosher. They Also Have No High Fructose Corn Syrup & Are Plant Based Which Is A Real Plus. They Are Very Delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan T

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, Substantial Snack
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these fig bars for the first time to have snacks available during a three-day drive across the country. Having previously had various brands of fig bars, I thought I knew what to expect. I was surprised by how different these taste compared to other, similar products I have tried (e.g., Nabisco Fig Newtons); these have a more authentic and fresh taste to them. Also, they are quite satisfying in terms of satiating hunger. These are a flavorful, wholesome option for everyday snacking.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: So so so goooood!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so so so so so glad I discovered this healthy treat! I try to eat healthy, but I have an extreme sweet tooth! I also have G.I. issues which are exacerbated when I eat processed foods. Honestly, these bars are the PERFECT solution! They taste like real chocolate brownies! I never, would ever suspect that they are from dates!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim BookJunkie, freelance editor & proofreader

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars but the packaging must be flimsy and/or appropriate care is not being taken in storing and delivering. In a prior order, the fig bars had clearly been stored next to bars of berry-flavored bars and the berry flavor, which I don't care for, had seeped through. This time, a strong disinfectant has permeated each bar so that I am unable to eat them. I'm very disappointed and will probably - reluctantly - not order again. I understand and appreciate that we are all trying to be careful about germs but I really don't want to eat disinfectant. It tastes vile and can be dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Half of them were stale
customer_reviews.text: Bought a large case of the chocolate ones. Wife took some to work and thought the second one tasted funny. Asked a co worker to try it and she said it was stale. Went through the first box and inspected package and and found small tears where the UPC stamp is on half of them. The ones at my wife's work are just fine. Its obviously a packaging issue.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Gagnon

customer_reviews.title: The best of the lot
customer_reviews.text: I love all of Nature's Bakery fig bars... well, except for the gluten-free varieties... but the lemon is my favorite. Dip the bars in hot coffee or a good black tea like Earl Grey to heighten the lemon flavor. All of the various flavors of fig bars are great this way, but especially the lemon. It's exquisite.
customer_reviews.author: Go

customer_reviews.title: Great pick-me-up or post-workout snack for a really great price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little snack, and really affordable price! Because they're whole wheat (and very high in carbs) a single package of this with an apple usually satiates me until lunchtime! 12 of these babies in a box for less than $6?! At my local stores, a single pack costs $1.29 or slightly more! Which do you think I'll be buying in future?
customer_reviews.author: A.K.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for taking my pills, and they are the perfect size, I can take them with me when I go out, and have to take my medication, they are great, and tasty!
customer_reviews.author: ShannonES

customer_reviews.title: STALE/MOLDY
customer_reviews.text: Been buying these forever for my kid and husband... the last two deliveries they said tasted stale and/or moldy!! I went to look at the reviews and others have said the same thing. So unacceptable. You know something is wrong when your chocolate obsessed kid doesn’t want his chocolate breakfast bars. My husband said he bought a box of a different flavor from Target once and had the same issue so it’s just this brand. Definitely lost a frequent buying customer here!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Picky preschooler loves these!
customer_reviews.text: I have young kids who are notoriously picky about what they will eat. It's hard to find yummy, filling treats that aren't made with a bunch of junk. All my kids will eat these, the blueberry & the strawberry flavor are their favorites. They make an easy, filling breakfast on busy mornings. I was buying these from Kroger in the regular retail box, but these large boxes are a much better deal. I can get one of each flavor with subscribe & save every month & that's usually enough.
customer_reviews.author: ActionJem

customer_reviews.title: HUGE fan of anything Fig, but didn't get excited over these, however open to trying other flavors!
customer_reviews.text: Quality and healthy ingredients, but carbs were very high! Super fresh and excellent! I tried not to compare with Fig Newtons, but it was hard not to. Despite the high carbs, they weren't too sweet, at all. Texture was pretty good, with a slightly drier/more whole wheat cookie crust and fig was a little chunkier/grittier than Fig Newtons. Overall, okay, but I just didn't love the overall flavor, but can't specifically pinpoint why. They met my breakfast need with skim milk, but left a little unsatisfied, so probably won't order again. I would try another flavor, however, as nothing in particular was off putting or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya C.

customer_reviews.title: These are AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: These are my absolute favorite quick snacks around! I’m a super busy Therapist and need a quick snack to keep me going and I always reach for Raspberry Fig Bars. At only 100 calories (each bar) they fit perfectly into my daily intake without sending me over the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hall

customer_reviews.title: Normally great but not this time
customer_reviews.text: These are normally fantastic. So I bought a large box of them. That was a mistake they all had the same defect. They were smaller and they were missing the thick edges (my favorite part) and were deformed. BAD BATCH.
customer_reviews.author: Koshka

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor, and satisfying, - excellent ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: If you like whole grains, and organic bakery items, you should like these too! If you expect classic fig type newton cookies from the store, like when u were a kid... you may not. But, these really are well made cookies. I would absolutely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Lonestar

customer_reviews.title: Box is way to big
customer_reviews.text: The boxes and envelopes are way oversized. You can fit two items in the same box. Not only for this but for almost every item I buy. A big waste, environmentally and economically.
customer_reviews.author: John Spinosa

customer_reviews.title: Very Good, Try 'em !
customer_reviews.text: If you like fig cookies, but have never tried these bars, do yourself a favor a give this product a chance. Nature's Bakery nails it, love these bars, all flavors, very highly recommended !!
customer_reviews.author: Vic V.

customer_reviews.title: You have to try these Apple Cinnamon Fig Bars!
customer_reviews.text: These fig bars are so delicious! I happened upon them while shopping for groceries on Amazon and boy am I glad I tried them. Not everyone in our family likes figs... in fact my eldest and her roommate distinctly do not like fig bars. However, EVERYONE loves this Apple Cinnamon flavor. If you are craving a sweet baked good, this fits the bill without busting your healthy eating plan completely. These were especially delicious paired with hot coffee out in the cold morning air in Yellowstone last fall waiting for the wolf pack to return from the hunt :)
customer_reviews.author: OregonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: A Household Favorite
customer_reviews.text: These are a popular item in my house ... they're sweet enough to serve as a sort-of dessert, but also a nice snack to provide a little extra fuel on the way to (or returning from) the gym. 2 bars (one package) has about 80 mg of sodium, which is a manageable amount on my low-sodium regime. For some reason, the original fig flavor -- my preferred flavor -- can be hard to find in local stores, so Amazon is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie's Dad

customer_reviews.title: They have some good stuff(ing) in them!!
customer_reviews.text: I probably won't get the peach/apricot anymore, just because I don't think they're worth the extra money, but I sure do like the blueberry bars, AND the raspberry bars. I think they more nutrition in them, than do the ones in the grocery store. They are made with whole wheat. Also, they taste great and they have fewer of the "bad" ingredients, like high fructose corn syrup and saturated fat.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Ricia

customer_reviews.title: Yummy, yummy, yummy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! I wasn't a fan of Fig Newton's as a kid but blueberry flavor caught my attention. They're wonderful! Blueberry flavor isn't super sweet like pop tarts or a lot of breakfast bars. But it's rich enough to taste more like a treat & filling enough to be satisfying either as a quick unmessy breakfast on the go or a pick me up! I just reordered them & am trying the apple cinnamon next!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Mattson

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I am in LOVE with these they’re the best!!!!! Soft, light, fluffy & not overwhelmingly sweet.
customer_reviews.author: CharB

customer_reviews.title: exactly as pictured and came early!
customer_reviews.text: My whole family loves these brownies and I love that they have all natural ingredients! The fiber in them keeps you feeling fuller longer and they are super fresh not stale! They're hard to find in store so grateful to have found them online for a reasonable price 😊
customer_reviews.author: L.H.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite snack!
customer_reviews.text: I love the brownies! They are low carb and sugar which works for my diet. Very tasty! Been my favorite for the last 5 years! They go well with milk and ice cream too:)
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: The best brownies
customer_reviews.text: Ooh so yummy. It the perfect chocolate fix. I have IBS and I can’t have a lot of processed foods but I saw these at sprouts one day and had to try them. When I didn’t get a flare up I was excited! Finally a chocolate item with real ingredients and tastes amazing, and I can eat it. I immediately went into amazon and saw I could do subscribe and save. I am one happy momma!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: So delicious
customer_reviews.text: I love these fig bars! I wanted to compare them to the "Fig Newtons" but these are so much better; less sweet, more nutritional, fresher. They're cheaper on Amazon than the grocery store for me. Raspberry and blueberry are the best flavors!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Nature's Bakery Double Chocolate Brownies
customer_reviews.text: I really love these little brownies! As a dessert, they’re filling enough to satisfy my chocolatey sweet cravings and a good bit healthier than your average brownie. I also appreciate that they’re packaged in twin packs. It keeps them from going stale and allows me to grab and go.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Figs
customer_reviews.text: These Apple Cinnamon Fig Bars are awesome! I have liked fig bars since I was a kid back in the 1980s. But the quality of fig bars has gone down since then. Fig Newtons are just gross now. These are the fig bars to get in 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Teems Jr

customer_reviews.title: Portion controlled snack
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect it, but lemon turned out to be the favorite in my household. Very nice bar and not so addicting that can't exert some self-control. I like having some portion control packaged this way. Edit: The only thing I don't like is the price. It has hiked from $7+ to $11+ and I cancelled my subscription. Nearly a dollar a packet was a bit too much of a hike for me.
customer_reviews.author: AGS

customer_reviews.title: High Sugar and misleading serving size, not organic, but at least made of food
customer_reviews.text: Half a brownie is one serving size. 20g of sugar in each single-serve bag. Non-organic wheat, so presumably contains more ghrelin and pesticides than you would want. Priced reasonably, but not great for such cheap ingredients. At least they are free of added chemicals and soy, so overall worth eating when nothing higher quality is available.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Taste AWFUL!! DRY AND OLD!!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these (blueberry flavor) and the raspberry ones all the time at Walmart and love them. So when I seen I could get more for the same price on Amazon I decided to order some. When I opened one up and started eating it, right away the taste was AWFUL!! It tasted very dry and idk, old maybe... it just did not taste anything like the ones I buy from walmart. I will not be purchasing this flavor from Amazon again and if the raspberry wins up tasting just as bad I wknt be buying them again either
customer_reviews.author: Trish deihm

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: These are great tasting for an amazing price! Quick shipping and taste fresh and soft!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Mold
customer_reviews.text: Listen to the other reviews, opened mine up and quite a few had moldy bars in them. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Yumm office loves them
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a new treat for the office. These are great, comes in a variety box too. Flavor is great, fresh and late expiration date (not tomorrow like others). Will order again as they are being devoured.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Momma

customer_reviews.title: So yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I've been eating these for awhile. I love the variety of flavors too.
customer_reviews.author: SarahNatureArt

customer_reviews.title: Deliciously priced snacks
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love these fig bars. They aren’t too sweet and they’re small enough you don’t get overwhelmed with sweetness. I order these every couple of months. And here in amazon is the lowest price I’ve seen for this box.
customer_reviews.author: NCruz3

customer_reviews.title: Best on-the-go snack and breakfast food.
customer_reviews.text: I bring these everywhere with me; these bars are a must-have if you're attending court (bring water!) or are lucky enough to have work where you can graze on a snack. Easy to nibble off of when driving and sipping coffee in the morning. Great portion size - also perfect for taking a pill; chew, pop in the pill, swallow the lot, and DONE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: As a kid I LOVED Fig Newtons but as an adult I can’t stand that crunch when you eat them. I have found these and renewed my Love for the Newton Type Cookie. These are healthy and delicious. That’s a win win! Try them!
customer_reviews.author: Half Cracked n Hammered DIY

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with latest delivery
customer_reviews.text: I used to really like these fig bars but recently subscribed and save changed from single boxes to a package of 6. The problem is that these taste stale. The cookie part has a drier texture an off taste. I can't find a sell by date on the individual package of two or the box but I assume the lower quality of these from the ones we used to get are due to age.
customer_reviews.author: Joe in Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: First time buy - Peach Apricot flavor
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something new to try and found these. I am glad I did. While not quite the same as Nabisco's Fig Newtons (lots of history there) these are pretty tasty. Will buy these again. Maybe the fig flavor next.
customer_reviews.author: NCF

customer_reviews.title: Order arrived Stale. But usually love these.
customer_reviews.text: We typically love this product. My family eats them everyday. Unfortunately, this subscribe and save shipment of several boxes was a dud. They are stale. This has never happened to us before. Hate to go to the Post office to return during CoVid19 times! I wrap a wet paper towel around them and put them in the microwave for 11 seconds to soften them back up. 😐
customer_reviews.author: AngePange

customer_reviews.title: Blueberry bars!
customer_reviews.text: These are so good. It’s like a fig newton cookie but blueberry. There are two in a packet. Good for kids snacks or on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Filling and Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I keep these around as a snack and I find the especially useful for raising my blood glucose. I have type 2 Diabetes and sometime forget to eat or get side tracked in the morning and wait too long after getting up to get some breakfast. These are prefect to snack on and bring my blood sugar up to then take my medications and prepare breakfast. I also love to keep these in the car as a quick pick me up when I am driving and realize I haven't eaten and can't stop right away. They will hold me for a while to get to a pace to eat a proper meal.
customer_reviews.author: David K. Carpe

customer_reviews.title: Great Bars, Terrible Amazon Pricing
customer_reviews.text: Great bars! Only problem is they are SUPER EXPENSIVE on Amazon. Amazon had a sweet "add-on" deal for awhile where they were $4 for a pack of 12, but that is gone as of the time of this writing. Can be bought in 24 packs at multiple other retailers (Sam's Club, boxed.com, etc) for $10 or less. Granted these are variety packs, but it is not worth it to pay just as much for less.
customer_reviews.author: Bla

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and filling
customer_reviews.text: I grew up on fig newtons and other snacks, recently bought some at a grocery and remembered how good they are. These Nature's Bakery fig bars are very good. They come in a box of 24 - 12 twinpacks, 2 per wrapped pack. Very handy to carry as a snack. They say real fruit and whole grain and it tastes like it. Good stuff. FYI, walnuts are an excellet snack addition with figs.
customer_reviews.author: D. Craig

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've cut ALL sugar out of my diet, except for these awesome snacks. They are healthy (enough) and filling, which is great. I didn't expect to like a snack with figs, but I was pleasantly surprised. I'm a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Veda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and fresh
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are delicious, fresh and not overly sweet. I can get them from Sam's Club but the ones I order from Amazon seem fresher to me. There is one dowside: Did you realize that one of these little packs is actually 2 servings? I guess I will have to treat them as an occasional treat. All this time I've been downing the whole pack thinking that it was the best 110 calorie treat that I'd ever had! Didn't realize that I was consuming over 200 something calories!
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, natural ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Love this flavor and seemed super fresh compared to the huge box I normally buy at Costco. Decided to try this as I couldn’t get Costco to deliver and I’m an hour from one. Kids and adults will love them.
customer_reviews.author: Shady

customer_reviews.title: Yes buy them !!
customer_reviews.text: Tasty moist just soft enough raspberry is seriously delicious , a lot for the money c, an freeze them if I want to stock up the subscribe cost is so low. Kids and adults in my house love them. And easy to take on the run packed individually . I buy two boxes at a time 12 in each box but two cookies to a pack so 24 individual sized cookie bars in each .
customer_reviews.author: Erin H.

customer_reviews.title: Mmm....
customer_reviews.text: I love these brownies I think i better stop eating them!
customer_reviews.author: Saimeen Zakaria

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Our Expectations...
customer_reviews.text: We were very surprised at the size of these individual "twin packs". One bar is a nice snack, adding the second bar becomes a meal. Great for grab and go lunches or energy boost. Great Price as well. I highly recommend this product. Our favorite is the raspberry. Buy 2 boxes or more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gettin figgy with it
customer_reviews.text: All I have to say is these are AMAZING. One of my favorite snacks ever, aside from Bobo's oat bites (apple pie flavor). each individual package comes with 2 fig bars in it, they satisfy any sweet tooth. Order them now!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Rustles III

customer_reviews.title: They sold me boxes of hard dry stale fig bars
customer_reviews.text: I subscribe to get these fig bars. This is the second time I’ve gotten hard stale figs. I just got them 9-30-19 but the expiration date/ best by... is 11-2019, 10-2019 1-2020 how am I going to eat 15 boxes of dry hard fighting bars. I understand the practice of rotating stock but selling me hard stale figs is annoying and insulting. Yes they are edible, but very dry and hard. Stop unloading old product to people who used to like this brand.
customer_reviews.author: cm

customer_reviews.title: In Love
customer_reviews.text: These are my second favorite fig bars. I love the Apple cinnamon one's best but these have amazing flavor. I can eat one of these when I'm hungry and they will keep me for 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Menk

customer_reviews.title: try these. Seriously they are so good
customer_reviews.text: These are so good. They are both healthy and they taste great. If you don't have time or the patience to make your own healthy brownies these are a great way to do that. I subscribed so every month I get restocked. Try them!
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting whole-wheat snack
customer_reviews.text: I've been ordering these whole wheat fig bars for a few years now. They're very filling and have a nice flavor. Good snack to have with coffee or tea when you're hungry and need a boost. They get 4 stars instead of 5 stars because some batches seem really dry. The current batch is on the moist side which is what I prefer. I would recommend and will continue to purchase as a good whole-wheat snack.
customer_reviews.author: ButtonsTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Packaging could be cut waaayy down, the ‘bar’ takes up just barely over half the wrapper. There are 2 large size fig newtons inside the pack - which are 2 servings not 1. This was an add on item for me but I was pretty excited about them..they taste great and I need something to eat quickly when I’m at work and I don’t have time to eat an actual meal, but once I finish this box I can’t see myself ordering them again, I feel like I can find a much healthier alternatives
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great kids snack, without the guilt
customer_reviews.text: Good quality ingredients, great flavor, and a soft chewy texture you expect from a large fig bar like these. The whole family loves these, and they're a great snack on the go or at home.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Mizell

product_meta.title: Nature’s Bakery Whole Wheat Fig Bars, Blueberry, Real Fruit, Vegan, Non-GMO, Snack bar, 1 box with 12 twin packs (12 twin packs)
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Blueberry| Size:12 Count (Pack of 1)Nature's Bakery Whole Wheat Fig Bars are fuel for everyday life's great journeys. Made with wholesome and natural ingredients, our delicious soft-baked baked bars are filled with real fruit for an on-the-go snack that satisfies. Perfectly portioned in two bars, our twin-packs don't melt, crumble or break--they're the daily snack companion you can rely on to be there when you need them most.
feature_bullets: WE “HEART FIGS!” Our Whole Wheat Fig Bars are always an excellent choice for families on-the-go in search of a wholesome win-win: convenience and nutrition, all in one

CONVENIENCE Nature’s Bakery Whole Wheat Figs Bars are a perfect snack for kids or adults. Grab one as a quick healthy breakfast bar, use as a wholesome treat for kids’ lunches, or enjoy as a convenient afterschool snack. Great for active and busy families

NUTRITION Made with you and your family in mind, Nature's Bakery Whole Wheat Fig Bars are soft-baked with NO cholesterol, GMOs or high fructose corn syrup. No Artificial Flavors, Certified Vegan, Plant Based, Kosher, Made in a Nut-Free Facility, Low Sodium, Soy Free, Dairy Free, and 0g Trans Fat
THOUGHTFUL INGREDIENTS Real, sun-ripened blueberries, figs and wholesome whole wheat make our homemade recipe the perfect boost in your everyday
SIZE Contains 1 Box of 12 twin packs (12 Twin Packs; 2 x 1 oz. snack bars per twin pack) of Nature's Bakery Blueberry Whole Wheat Fig Bars

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
